# Required API files configuration
# One relative API path per line (relative to ./api directory)
# Empty lines and lines starting with # are ignored

health.js
chat.js
contactform.js

# Payment endpoints
create-payment-intent.js
create-subscription.js

# Stripe integration
stripe/webhook.js
stripe/create-checkout-session.js
